definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

pinyin: ke3 zhuan3 huan4 tong2 wei4 su4

definition: conversion from simple to traditional Chinese characters

pinyin: wang3 luo4 di4 zhi3 zhuan3 huan4

sentences.english: Wants efficient changeovers between products with minimum downtime.
sentences.chinese: 用最少時間進行產品間轉換。

sentences.english: The lines can include transformations and other sexiness.
sentences.chinese: 這些線可以包括轉換以及其它吸引眼球的東西。

sentences.english: Post-simulation shows that the deserializer meets the design requirements.
sentences.chinese: 後仿真結果表明，本文設計的串並轉換電路滿足要求。

sentences.english: Process flow of olefin conversion unit is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 對烯烴轉換工藝技術作了介紹。

sentences.english: According to the Chinese character semeiology, code-switching function is the basic information function of character system.
sentences.chinese: 代碼轉換功能是文字系統最基本的信息功能之一。

sentences.english: You can adjust for that by using made-up conversion rates known as Purchasing Power Parities , or PPPs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用取得的轉換率，即購買力平價對其進行調整。

sentences.english: Try to avoid sending large records to the front end to be transformed there.
sentences.chinese: 儘量避免發送大型記錄到前端並在那裏轉換。

sentences.english: Dual-space approach is for multi-target tracking.
sentences.chinese: 面目標跟蹤採用對偶空間轉換算法等方法。

sentences.english: In theory, to issue exchangeable bonds on the market is good.
sentences.chinese: 從理論上講，在市場上發行可轉換債券是好的。

sentences.english: You can use these transformations to convert the data from one model to another.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用這些轉換將數據從一個模型轉換爲另一個。

sentences.english: You can use these transformations to convert the data from one model to another.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用這些轉換將數據從一個模型轉換爲另一個。

sentences.english: Cameron has supervised the creation of a new high-definition transfer for the DVD.
sentences.chinese: 喀麥隆指導了這部DVD的全新高清晰數碼轉換。

sentences.english: The light-converting efficiency has been researched with photocurrent measurements.
sentences.chinese: 光生電流譜研究了薄膜的光電轉換效率。

sentences.english: A/D conversion interface is an important part in the fore channel of data-collecting system.
sentences.chinese: 轉換接口是數據採集系統前向通道中的一個重要環節。

sentences.english: You can also combine multiple transformation animations in the same element.
sentences.chinese: 還可以在同一個元素中組合多個轉換動畫。

sentences.english: Run the transformations and create code in the output language.
sentences.chinese: 運行這些轉換並且用輸出語言創建代碼。

definition: to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
